items.label: 56a27b935457a317163910b8
items.name: 10 Residential Service TOU Rate
items.description: Time-Of-Use default service is available under this Rider, upon the terms and conditions set forth herein, to the Residential Customer Class that: (1) have had smart meters installed pursuant to the West Penn Power Smart Meter Technology Procurement and Installation Plan; and (2) affirmatively elect to receive service under this Rider and comply with its enrollment procedures. Customers that apply for service under this Rider must agree, as a condition of service hereunder, to allow the Company to share their Customer information as defined in the Company's Electric Generation Supplier Coordination Tariff with the EGS(s) that provides TOUDefault, subject to the requirements, restrictions and limitations, if any, of the Commission's applicable regulations dealing with the release of Customer information.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = State Tax adjustment + Phase II Energy Efficiency & Conservation charge + Smart Meter technologies charge + Default Service support charge + Price to Compare Default Service rate rider
